showScoreExcerpt:
"The way this team portrays women and treats marital violence in 'Carousel' raises questions in a contemporary audience...This production plays like itâ€™s 1945...The sound of the music was rich and sweet...If you have never seen 'Carousel,' this production is pleasant and worth seeing. Several of the performances are as good as they possibly could be. But the production lacks imagination and never really thrills an audience the way some past revivals have."
